equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>4.64</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>90</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>47.21%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

equipment.name: Choker
base_affixes: Critical Strikes with <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills increase your Attack Speed by <text class='c_random'>23%</text> for <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Helm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.

equipment.name: Archon Faulds
base_affixes: Your Minions gain <text class='c_random'>27.6%</text> increased Damage Reduction.

equipment.name: Ritual Dagger
base_affixes: Distant enemies have a <text class='c_number'>8%</text> chance to be Stunned for <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds when they hit you. You deal <text class='c_random'>19.06%</text> increased damage to Stunned enemies.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +5.5% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites
+5% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging enemies with <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> has a <text class='c_random'>19.32%</text> chance to spawn a pool of <text class='c_important'>Blight</text> under the target that deals <text class='c_random'>77.26%</text> bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a <text class='c_number'>10%</text> chance to generate <text class='c_random'>41.69</text> Essence when hitting a <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemy.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
base_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>2</text>.

equipment.name: Jade Relic
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>17.08%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>16.21%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>32.43%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Ring
base_affixes: +9.5% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
+0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
strikethrough_affixes: While <text class='c_important'>Army of the Dead</text> is active, your Minions gain <text class='c_random'>92.81%</text> Attack Speed and take <text class='c_number'>90%</text> reduced damage.
added_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>3</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
